name: Super Duper Genre Pooper 2021
description:
A WarioWare-style compilation featuring cross-genre microgames. Draw two genre cards from the deck, then see what the combination yields! 

Made for GMTK Jam 2021, a game about "joining together" genres. (I know, it's a bit of a stretch.) I already had the idea of making cross-genre games knocking about my head, so I figured I'd do a bunch of them at once. Managed to knock out about 11 before I ran out of time!

Shoutout to Molly for a banging OST, Zach for naming my creation, and Jude for keeping me company <3
